name: Super Halloween Brawl
description:
May the best win in this Halloween styled Fighting Game! :D

Player 1 - Left and right arrows to move, up arrow to jump and down arrow to attack.

Player 2 - A and D to move, W to jump and S to attack.

 - Skeleton - Can throw bones      - Zombie - Charges

 - Vampire - Bat transformation    - Witch - Magic slash

 - Ghost - Double spirit             - Pumpkin - Head flames

 - Devil - Devilish fireballs        - Blob - Paralyzing jelly

Halloween is approaching at high speed.

To decide who the strongest is, the monsters organize a great tournament.

Win every fight and don't have a fright!

Comment down who your favorite Character is! :D

Some of the Sounds were made by Ryan Udairam (https://ryanudairam.com/).

This may be glitchy, if so make sure to reload the Page/Game each time you switch from Modes.

Made in three days for the 13th Mini Jam, enjoy! ^^
